options_page_header_2.description: Name of extension in navigation sidebar

options_tab_whitelist.description: Sidebar tab label and main heading inside corresponding tab

options_tab_advanced.description: Sidebar tab label and main heading inside corresponding tab

options_tab_contribute.description: Button in navigation sidebar to support Adblock Plus

options_readMore.description: Read more element that shows tooltip with description

options_general_description.message: Determine what Adblock Plus shows and hides on websites

options_protection_privacy_tooltip.description: Tooltip for 'Disable tracking' option in General tab
options_protection_privacy_tooltip.message: Protect your personal data by removing all forms of tracking from the Internet including information collectors.

options_protection_social_tooltip.description: Tooltip for 'Remove Social Media Buttons' option in General tab
options_protection_social_tooltip.message: The social media buttons (or icons) on the websites that you visit allow social media networks to build a profile of you based on your browsing habits - even when you don't click on them. Hide these buttons to protect your profile.

options_acceptableAds_description.description: Acceptable Ads section description in General tab
options_acceptableAds_description.message: Acceptable Ads are nonintrusive ads. They are the middle ground between ad blocking and supporting online content because they generate revenue for website owners.

options_acceptableAds_ads_label.description: Acceptable Ads section option label in General tab

options_acceptableAds_ads_description_1.description: Acceptable Ads section 'Allow some nonintrusive ads' option description in General tab
options_acceptableAds_ads_description_1.message: Nonintrusive ads are not annoying and do not interfere with the content you are viewing. These ads collect some information about your browsing habits to provide you with more relevant ads. Read more about the nonintrusive ad criteria

options_acceptableAds_ads_description_2.description: Acceptable Ads section 'Allow some nonintrusive ads' option description in General tab
options_acceptableAds_ads_description_2.message: Note: The ads collect data about your browsing habits not Adblock Plus.

options_acceptableAds_privacy_label.description: Acceptable Ads section option label in General tab
options_acceptableAds_privacy_label.message: Allow only nonintrusive ads that are privacy-friendly

options_acceptableAds_privacy_descriptio.description: Acceptable Ads section 'Allow only nonintrusive ads that are privacy-friendly ' option description in General tab
options_acceptableAds_privacy_descriptio.message: These ads do not collect personal user information. Ads may be less relevant as a result.

options_acceptableAds_dnt_notification.description: Acceptable Ads section's notification (being shown if Do Not Track is not enabled) in General tab
options_acceptableAds_dnt_notification.message: Note: You have Do Not Track (DNT) disabled in your Chrome settings. For this feature to work properly, please enable DNT in your browser preferences. Find out how to turn on DNT.

options_acceptableAds_none_label.description: Acceptable Ads section option label in General tab

options_language_description.description: Language section description in General tab
options_language_description.message: Optimize Adblock Plus for the language(s) you typically browse websites in.

options_language_empty.description: Language section language list empty text in General tab
options_language_empty.message: You don't have any language specific filters.

options_language_change.description: Language section language list single entry text in General tab

options_language_tip.description: Language section tip in General tab
options_language_tip.message: TIP: Only select the languages you need. Selecting more will slow down the ad blocker and therefore your browsing speed.

options_more_filters_description.description: More filters section description in General tab
options_more_filters_description.message: These are additional filters you previously added to Adblock Plus.

options_more_filters_note.description: More filters section note in General tab
options_more_filters_note.message: Note: These filters are managed by third party authors. Adblock Plus is not responsible for them.

options_language_add.description: Add other language button in General Tab

options_whitelist_description.message: You've turned off ad blocking on these websites. You will see ads on these websites.

options_whitelist_empty_1.message: You aren't whitelisting any websites yet.

options_whitelist_empty_2.message: Websites you trust and want to allow ads on will be shown here.

options_whitelist_duplicate.description: Duplicate hostname warning of whitelist text input

options_advanced_description.message: Customize Adblock Plus, add or remove filter lists, create and maintain your own filter lists

options_customize_blockElement.description: Option label of customize section in Advanced tab

options_customize_blockElement_tooltip.description: Tooltip text for Show 'Block element' option item of customize section in Advanced tab
options_customize_blockElement_tooltip.message: Temporarily block annoying items on a webpage, e.g. images or animated slideshows.

options_customize_showDevToolsPanel.description: Option label of customize section in Advanced tab
options_customize_showDevToolsPanel.message: Show 'Adblock Plus' panel in the developer tools

options_customize_showDevToolsPanel_tool.description: Tooltip text for Show 'Adblock Plus' panel option item of customize section in Advanced tab
options_customize_showDevToolsPanel_tool.message: View blocked and whitelisted items from your browser's developer tools panel.

options_customize_showNotifications.description: Option label of customize section in Advanced tab

options_customize_showNotifications_tool.description: Tooltip text for Show notifications option item of customize section in Advanced tab
options_customize_showNotifications_tool.message: Turn off all notifications from Adblock Plus.

options_filterList_description.description: Filter lists section description in Advanced tab
options_filterList_description.message: Each Adblock Plus setting functions because of a filter list. Below are the corresponding filter lists to all your Adblock Plus settings. You can also add additional filters created and maintained by our trusted community. Learn more.

options_filterList_column_status.description: Column name of filter list table in Advanced tab

options_filterList_column_name.description: Column name of filter list table in Advanced tab

options_filterList_column_update.description: Column name of filter list table in Advanced tab

options_filterList_state_active.description: State of filter list in Advanced tab

options_filterList_state_disabled.description: State of filter list in Advanced tab

options_filterList_now.description: Text inside 'Last update' column in Advanced tab

options_filterList_minutes.description: Text inside 'Last update' column in Advanced tab

options_filterList_hours.description: Text inside 'Last update' column in Advanced tab

options_customFilters_title.message: Create and edit your filter list

options_customFilters_description.description: Custom filter lists section description in Advanced tab
options_customFilters_description.message: Write your own custom filters to further control what content Adblock PLus allows or blocks.

options_customFilters_widget_title.description: Custom filter widget title in Advanced tab

options_customFilters_tip.description: Custom filter widget(empty) hint text in Advanced tab
options_customFilters_tip.message: Filters you create will show up here.

options_customFilters_start.description: Custom filter widget(empty) button text in Advanced tab

options_customFilters_learn.description: Custom filter widget(empty) link text in Advanced tab
options_customFilters_learn.message: Learn how to write filter lists

options_customFilters_edit_placeholder.description: Custom filter widget(empty) placeholder text in Advanced tab

options_filterList_lastDownload_invalidD.message: Failed, not a valid filter list

options_filterList_updateNow.description: Context menu item in advanced tab, appears after click on subscription

options_filterList_website.description: Context menu item in advanced tab, appears after click on subscription

options_filterList_source.description: Context menu item in advanced tab, appears after click on subscription

options_filterList_delete.description: Context menu item in advanced tab, appears after click on subscription

options_customFilter_edit.description: Label below single input view of user's filter list in Advanced tab

options_customFilter_cancel.description: Label below raw view of user's filter list in Advanced tab

options_customFilter_save.description: Label below raw view of user's filter list in Advanced tab

options_help_description.message: Find help or get in touch with us

options_report_issue.description: 'Support' section list item in Help tab
options_report_issue.message: Think content or functionality is being incorrectly blocked by us? Report incorrectly blocked items here

options_report_ad.description: 'Support' section list item in Help tab
options_report_ad.message: See an ad that you think shouldn't be there? Report an ad

options_report_bug.description: 'Support' section list item in Help tab
options_report_bug.message: Found a bug? Send us a bug report

options_report_forum.description: 'Support' section list item in Help tab
options_report_forum.message: Want support from our community? Go to the Forum

options_social_description.description: 'Get in touch' section description in Help tab
options_social_description.message: Have a question or a new idea? We're here to help.

options_dialog_predefined_title.description: Dialog title for adding a predefined subscription
options_dialog_predefined_title.message: Do you really want to use this filter list?
